data.event: A Paris man was arrested Sunday afternoon on five counts of rape of a child.

event.title: 1205 Lone Oak Road Lot 12, was arrested

data.event: Jonathan J. “Wee Man” McDaniel, 19, of 1205 Lone Oak Road Lot 12, was arrested at Paris City Hall by Paris Police Department Sgt. Ricky Watson.
In other incidents: More information has been released on the Wednesday arrest of a Paris woman for child abuse and neglect, as was originally reported in Thursday’s Post-Intelligencer.

According to a report by PPD Patrolman Jamie James, Katrina L. Chappell, 24, of 1199 N. Poplar St., allegedly left her baby inside a vehicle at a Mineral Wells Avenue store for approximately 45 minutes while she was inside shopping.
Money was stolen from a woman’s purse Thursday night or Friday morning as it sat inside an unlocked truck at her Clearview Drive home east of Whitlock.
Money was stolen from a woman’s purse Thursday night or Friday morning as it sat inside an unlocked truck at her Clearview Drive home east of Whitlock.
When the residents awoke Friday, they found the purse on the ground outside with $150 in cash missing from it.

event.title: was stolen during a burglary of Ridgeway Funeral Home, 201 Dunlap St. in Paris, Thursday night

data.event: Approximately $100 in cash was stolen during a burglary of Ridgeway Funeral Home, 201 Dunlap St. in Paris, Thursday night or Friday morning.
The theft occurred sometime between 9 p.m. Thursday and 8:30 a.m. Friday. There were no signs of forced entry and all doors and windows were locked.

event.title: was arrested at her residence Friday night

data.event: A Paris woman was arrested at her residence Friday night for filing a false report and contributing to the delinquency of a minor.
